ingredients: 2  kiwis, peeled and sliced,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons cider vinegar, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 tablespoons salt, 2 tablespoons chili powder, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 clove garlic, minced, 1 (3 pound) package country-style pork ribs
nutrition: Total Fat 31g 39%, Saturated Fat 11g 56%, Cholesterol 120mg 40%, Sodium 2446mg 106%, Total Carbohydrate 25g 9%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 19g, Protein 30g, Vitamin C 26mg 132%, Calcium 66mg 5%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 458mg 10%
